amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit use of funds for the purchase of welded shipboard anchor and mooring chain 4 inches in diameter and under unless the anchor and mooring chain are procured from a manufacturer that is part of the national technology and industrial base.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for the purchase of welded shipboard anchor and mooring chain 4 inches in diameter and under unless the anchor and mooring chain are procured from a manufacturer that is part of the national technology and industrial base.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DelBene amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DelBene amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A050) offered by Ms. DelBene.
